channel.title: CVE Feed for NetApp -- SnapCenter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NetApp -- SnapCenter

item.title: CVE-2024-21993|2024-08-01T22:35:34.687Z -- netapp -- snapcenter
item.description: SnapCenter versions prior to 5.0p1 are susceptible to a vulnerability which could allow an authenticated attacker to discover plaintext credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-21987|2024-08-01T22:35:34.484Z -- netapp -- snapcenter
item.description: SnapCenter versions 4.8 prior to 5.0 are susceptible to a vulnerability which could allow an authenticated SnapCenter Server user to modify system logging configuration settings
